name: Rosemary, Baby! from Prime Meats
description: In addition to being gorgeous, this punch has a delicate, fresh flavor: the sweetness from bourbon, honey, and sparkling wine is well-balanced by tart, fresh grapefruit and rosemary-laced Aperol.
recipeYield: Serves 12, plus extra rosemary infused Aperol and honey syrup
recipeIngredient: 9 ounces bourbon such as Four Roses Yellow Label
Garnish: grapefruit slices and additional rosemary sprigs

recipeInstructions.text: Place 3 long sprigs of fresh rosemary in a bottle of Aperol. Let sit for 3 hours at room temperature, strain.
Combine honey and warm water. Stir together thoroughly, or combine in a jar and shake until mixed.
Mix rosemary-infused Aperol, bourbon, and honey syrup in a punch bowl. Top with sparkling wine and seltzer. Garnish with grapefruit slices and rosemary sprigs and serve with ice.
